column2: ENGLISH
Visit Court

Request to be hosted at the court of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] in [Root.Location.GetName].  There you may improve (or worsen) your relationship with one another.  The travel away from court will require an approximately month-long absence.
Your request to visit will be sent.  We expect a reply in about 10 days.
Accepted my visit
Rejected my visit
Had a great time
Relaxed relationship
Strained relationship
Your offer of visitation was rejected by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It would seem that [From.GetSheHe] does not have time to entertain guests.
Oh... how unfortunate.

Messengers from [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName] have arrived in [Root.Location.GetName].  Their lord, [From.GetTitledFirstName], wishes to make a journey to your court for friendship and recreation.  Surely, this would be a valuable diplomatic opportunity as well.
It would be an honor to host the [From.GetTitle].
I have more important things to do than entertain [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has left [Root.Location.GetName] with [From.GetHerHis] entourage.  Their visit was brief, pleasant, and productive.  You expect greater cooperation and familiarity from [From.GetHerHim] hence.
The minstrels already sing of [Root.GetFirstName] and the [GetRootFromCompliment] [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has left [Root.Location.GetName] with [From.GetHerHis] entourage.  [From.GetHerHis] visit was unproductive, recent events straining cooperation between the two of you.  You and [From.GetFirstName] clearly have some conflicting interests that stand in the way of friendship.
Another day, another difficulty.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has left [Root.Location.GetName] with [From.GetHerHis] entourage to great fanfare.  [From.GetSheHe] is a fascinating person and most noble [From.GetLordLady] - a pleasure to host in [Root.Location.GetName].  The cordiality and respect between you and [From.GetFirstName] have clearly developed into a new friendship.
I can hardly wait to converse with [From.GetHerHim] again!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has left [Root.Location.GetName] with [From.GetHerHis] entourage abruptly.  That insufferable [From.GetLordLady] insulted and challenged you in your own court!  After a shouting match which ended in a drawing of blades, [From.GetFirstName] fled in a rage.  It is clear that the two of you are worse than strangers -  you are rivals.
That [GetRootFromInsult] is no longer welcome in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has left [Root.Location.GetName] with [From.GetHerHis] entourage reluctantly.  The two of you had great fun hunting and chatting the hours away from the comforts of your court to the fairest wilds of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].  The visit began with a parade and concluded with a lively banquet and exchange of parting gifts.
It is well that we have such good company in Middle-Earth.
You have left [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with your small entourage.  Your visit was brief, pleasant, and productive.  You expect greater cooperation and familiarity from [From.GetHerHim] hence.
Our relationship strengthens for the good of my people.

You have left [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with your small entourage.  Your visit was unproductive, recent events straining cooperation between the two of you.  You and [From.GetFirstName] clearly have some conflicting interests that stand in the way of friendship.
Perhaps making this trip was a mistake.

You have left [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with your small entourage to great fanfare.  [From.GetFirstName] is a hospitable host, fascinating person, and most noble [From.GetLordLady].  The cordiality and respect between you and [From.GetFirstName] have clearly developed into a new friendship.
I can hardly wait to visit [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] again!

You have left [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with your small entourage abruptly.  That insufferable [From.GetLordLady] demeaned and humiliated you repeatedly, in public no less!  After a shouting match which ended in a drawing of blades, you decided to abandon this misconceived attempt at building camaraderie.  It is clear that the two of you are worse than strangers -  you are rivals.
That [GetRootFromInsult] is an enemy of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].

You have left [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with your small entourage reluctantly.  The two of you had great fun hunting and chatting the hours away from the comforts of [From.GetHerHis] court to the fairest wilds of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName].  The visit began with a parade and concluded with a lively banquet and exchange of parting gifts.
It is well that we have such good company in Middle-Earth.
Your offer of visitation was graciously accepted by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHe] has sent a guide to accompany you and your retainers on your journey to [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
Excellent! We depart at once.
Has not recently visited a foreign court
